data.title: Former UK NBA Champions
data.text:
Kentucky Players Who Went on to Win NBA Championships

17 Players

Note: Pat Riley also won 4 NBA championships as Head Coach of the Los Angeles Lakers (1982, 1985, 1987, 1988) and an additional championship as Head Coach of the Miami Heat (2006)
